statements: SELECT * FROM user_credentials;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM user_credentials;

SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_role_mapping m ON u.user_id = m.user_id INNER JOIN user_roles r ON m.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, attempt_time, success FROM login_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT reset_id, user_id, reset_code, reset_time FROM password_resets ORDER BY reset_time ASC;
